description:
Wrapped in a breathable and quick-drying recycled fabric, this isn’t your normal helmet. Constructed from as few materials as possible, POC has designed the Myelin to be both safe and sustainable. The ventilated EPS liner absorbs impacts and can be recycled at the end of its life. The lip around the edge of the protects you, and is both recycled and recyclable. No glues or adhesives are used throughout the Myelin, so once it is time to replace it, it is easy to break the helmet down for recycling.

  • EPS shell is light, strong, and great at absorbing impacts
  • Adjustable elasticised liner comfortably cradles your head and keeps the helmet right where you need it most in case of an impact
  • Hidden under the recycled fabric shell is ample ventilation ports, keeping your head cool
  • Recycled nylon straps secure your helmet
  • Recycled polyester pads
  • Made from more than 50% recycled materials
name: POC Myelin Helmet - Unisex
